org.jasig.cas.util

Class EncodingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.util.EncodingUtils

  • public final class EncodingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This is EncodingUtils that encapsulates common base64 calls and operations in one spot.
    Since:
    4.3
